channel.title: My book searching function (libgen, no api)
channel.description:
I noticed they had API for libgen now, however I'm not sure how to search with it by title so I just decided to curl it out myself lol. I am sure it's something I am doing wrong with the API, but sometimes API sucks, so meh.
``` function __booksearch { bs=urlencode "${1}" &> /dev/null curl -s "http://libgen.io/search.php?req="$bs"&lg_topic=libgen&open=0&view=simple&res=999&phrase=1&column=def" >books id=$(grep -Eio "id[=][0-9]{7}>(.+?)" books|cut -d '=' -f 2|cut -d '>' -f 1) title=$(grep -Eio "id[=][0-9]{7}>(.+?)" books|cut -d '>' -f 2|cut -d '<' -f 1) rm books echo "[$id] $title" } alias booksearch='__booksearch' ```

item.title: My book searching function (libgen, no api)
item.dc:creator: fxbg
item.description:
I noticed they had API for libgen now, however I’m not sure how to search with it by title so I just decided to curl it out myself lol. I am sure it’s something I am doing wrong with the API, but sometimes API sucks, so meh.

function __booksearch
{
        bs=urlencode "${1}" &> /dev/null
        curl -s "http://libgen.io/search.php?req="$bs"&lg_topic=libgen&open=0&view=simple&res=999&phrase=1&column=def" >books
        id=$(grep -Eio "id[=][0-9]{7}>(.+?)" books|cut -d '=' -f 2|cut -d '>' -f 1)
        title=$(grep -Eio "id[=][0-9]{7}>(.+?)" books|cut -d '>' -f 2|cut -d '<' -f 1)
        rm books
        echo "[$id] $title"
}
alias booksearch='__booksearch'

usage:

(xenial)root@localhost:~/# booksearch "red team field manual"
[1160277] Rtfm: Red Team Field Manual
